parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of IPv6 Translation Service. This parameter is empty by default. It must be 2 to 100 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). It cannot start with http:// or [https://](https://。).

parameters.name: Ipv6TranslatorId
parameters.description: The ID of the IPv6 Translation Service instance.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the IPv6 Translation Service instance. The default name is the instance ID. It must be 2 to 100 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). It cannot start with http:// or [https://](https://。).

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region of the IPv6 Translation Service instance. You can call the **DescribeRegions** operation to query the most recent region list.
